img.style: color: #000000; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-family: 'book antiqua', palatino; font-size: 10px;

span.span: Ambassadors Preparatory Academy does not discriminate on the basis of sex, disability, race, color, age, or national origin in its
educational programs, activities, or employment as required by Title IX, Section 504 and Title VI.

p.span: Ambassadors Preparatory Academy is joining other districts in the state by closing until May 4.

Governor Abbott announced Tuesday, March 31, that all schools in Texas should close through April 30, with an anticipated re-opening on May 4, mirroring recommendations from the federal government, to further reduce the spread of COVID-19.

The health and safety of our students, staff, and community is our first priority. We ask everyone in the Ambassadors Preparatory Academy community to do your part to help prevent the spread of the virus by adhering to local stay-at-home orders and taking everyday preventative actions to stop transmission.

div.p: Ambassadors Preparatory Academy CLOSED until May 4, 2020 due to COVID-19 pandemic.
For more information visit our Learning from Home web page for COVID-19 information and school closure updates.
How to stay healthy and avoid illness - Check out our infographic here!
